actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to create an art bank to be established by American artists for exhibition in the U.S. Congress.

summary.text: Expresses the will of the Congress that an art bank be established which would serve as a depository of recent works of art created and lent by United States citizens for display in the House and Senate office buildings. Establishes a Board of Directors to determine which works shall be displayed. Provides that service upon the Board shall be on a voluntary basis.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to create an art bank to be established by American artists for exhibition in the U.S. Congress.
